name: CLARIN-D web tools
description: Tools for Analysing Research Data

name: CorpusExplorer
description: Software for corpus linguists and text/data mining enthusiasts. The CorpusExplorer combines over 50 interactive visualizations under a user-friendly interface.

name: Haxe-linguistics
description: Early linguistical analysis and natural language processing library for Haxe.

name: Natural
description: General natural language tools for Node.js.

name: Natural Language ToolKit (NLTK)
description: The most complete platform for building Python programs to work with human language data.

name: Snowball
description: Snowball is a language in which stemming algorithms can be easily represented.

name: Spacy
description: Industrial-strength  National Language Processing in Python.

name: UBIAI
description: Easy-to-use text annotation tool for teams with most comprehensive auto-annotation features. Supports NER, relations and document classification as well as OCR annotation for invoice labeling.

name: textblob-de
description: Nice alternative for spacy (see above).

name: UralicNLP
description: An open source Python library for processing morphologically rich and, for the most part, endangered Uralic languages. It can do morphological analysis, generation, lemmatization, disambiguation and lexical lookup for a great many Uralic languages.

name: Stemming algorithms for various European languages
description: Various stemming algorithms from snowball.

name: The Porter Stemmer Algorithm
description: The ‘official’ home page for distribution of the Porter Stemming Algorithm, written and maintained by its author, Martin Porter.

name: EuroRomCom Data
description: JSON formatted Pan-Romance word lists.

name: CEHugeWebCorpus
description: German corpus based on CommonCrawl

name: IDS Corpora
description: German Reference Corpus

name: Leipzig Corpora Collection
description: sampled sentences in different languages.

name: SdeWaC
description: big german internet corpus

name: How To Label Data
description: Guide on managing large scale linguistic annotation projects.

name: Low Resource Languages
description: A list of resources for conservation, development, and documentation of low resource (human) languages.

name: Language Science Press
description: Language Science Press is a born-digital scholar-led open access publisher in linguistics.

name: Evaluating German Transformer Language Models with Syntactic Agreement Tests

description: inverse document frequency

description: Lectures for University of Maryland class on computational linguistics.

description: An introductory book (2nd edition).

name: Natural Language Processing with Python
description: The book from the NLTK package.
